summary: Unit tests that verify the behavior of a score‑based stochastic differential equation variance‑exploding scheduler, checking its configuration handling, forward computation, sigma schedule, step dimensions, time indexing, deterministic and stochastic sampling, and execution of a complete inference loop without added noise.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the diffusion scheduler used in generative AI pipelines, reducing regression risk and ensuring reliable model sampling and inference.
